Fraud Test 2B Worst Offenders: Use count() instead of sum(). Each row in df_duplicates is considered 1 violation (i.e., a transaction with 30 duplicate entries is considered to be a single violation, not 30 separate violations). Using sum() treats 30 duplicate entries as 30 separate violations.
